labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: You are given mention recommendations once "@" is typed, or a channel list once "#" is typed. Once the "@"/"#" is deleted, the mention/channel list stays there. The mention/channel list still remains if one clicks out of, and back into the message bar. In action (using @): https://gyazo.com/cf3e33c99704df90766dfcc3c30a9fc4 This only happens if "@"/"#" is the first character. Anything before it, it functions normally (ily @ will not have the same result).
data.expected_result: You are given mention recommendations once "@" is typed, or a channel list once "#" is typed. Once the "@" or "#" is deleted, the mention recommendations/channel list disappear.
data.short_description: If @ is the first character of a message, and is deleted, the mention recommendation list is still there, even when you click out and back into the message bar. The same is said for # and the channel list.
data.steps_to_repro: - Type "@" or "#" - delete "@" or "#" - (continuation of bug) click out of message bar - click on message bar
